Name: SlimeGear
About the game: Story Before Pinion and Cog can help out their slime brothers, they must first go through a series of tests to prove their worthiness. Help Pinion and Cog Form together to do simple platforming, split into the two of them to use pinion as a jump-pad to get up higher ledges, and go through small tunnels. They must work together as Pinion cannot jump, and Cog cannot fit through the tunnels. They are also needed to hit double buttons in order to open certan doorways. Controlls W / Up / Space - - - Jump (Cog) / Go up tunnels (Pinion) / Reform (Pinion) / Small Jump (Ending) S / Down / Shift - - Switch between Pinion and Cog / Split apart (Cog) / Big Jump (Ending) A / Left - - - - - - - - Move left (Both) D / Right - - - - - - - Move Right (Both)
